A clear description of what problem this feature would solve. Ex: "I'm always frustrated when..."

A clear description of what you want to happen.

## Alternatives Considered

Any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Use Cases

Describe specific use cases where this feature would be helpful.

If you have ideas about how this could be implemented, share them here. Are you willing to contribute this feature?
